channel.title: Can anyone help me change the region on my psp - please :)
channel.description:
hey guys,
I bought this umd from ebay and i get the error "INVALID REGION CODE" or watever. From what i can make out there is an emulater or a program to change your psp region. My aunt got this psp from america and gave it to me as a present in england :(.
Any ideas?
thx,
solemn wishes.
